venue.name: Museum of Madeiran Heritage - Under Tent (Music Cafe Stage)

item.description:
Dear Portuguese Language Speakers,

The festival is centered around the Club Madeirense/Museum of Madeira Heritage.

There will be a tent set-up for the Museum Cafe Entertainment Stage.

I called the museum and they advised me to get there at least a hour early to get a good seat. The music starts at 8:00pm. I am setting the meeting time at 7pm.  I will sit as near to the front row center as possible. So look for me.

There are lots of food and drink vendors.

So lets eat and drink something and socialize one hour before the music starts.

At the museum, they will be selling pastries and Madeira wine.

Here is the schedule for the Museum Cafe entertainment.

Saturday, August 4, 2012   8:00p.m. – 11:30p.m.

Luis Duarte, Fado Singer


Viriato Ferreira, Viola Classica
Jose Silva, Guitarra Portuguesea
Pedro (Peter) Pimental,  Bass chello

http://portuguesefeast.com/page/museum-cafe-entertainment

http://www.rixsan.com/nbvisit/attract/mdrnmuse.htm

This event is a joint event with the Boston Culture Club Meetup Group, http://www.meetup.com/Boston-Culture-Club/. If you are a member of both groups, please only reserve your attendance under one group as to avoid confusion.

Please keep in mind that it is extremely difficult to connect and reconnect with people at such a large and crowded event if you are late.

Because I do not want you to miss out, I strongly recommend that you plan ahead and give yourself plenty of travel and parking time. Keep mind that there may be a lot of traffic due to the size of this event.

I will definitely be at the festival much earlier and enjoying other activities.

If like to meet me and my group of friends earlier, please send me a message to coordinate.

Please only reserve "yes" if you are definitely attending this event.

If you are a "maybe" please leave a comment on the event page.

I look forward to meeting you at the feast.

 

Joana
item.how_to_find_us: under the Tent (Music Cafe Stage) as near to the front row center as possible

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Fado Music at the New Bedford Portuguese Feast
